tokens.resolved_gloss: to search out (by any method, specifically in worship or prayer); by implication, to strive after

tokens.resolved_gloss: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
